get.summary: Get a blog post by ID
get.description: Get a blog post by ID

post.description: User login - creates a new session and invalidates any existing session
User logout - invalidates the current session token

get.description:
Get current user profile
Requires: Bearer token in Authorization header

List all users
Requires: Admin role

patch.description:
Update user information
- Admin can update any user
- Non-admin can only update themselves

Lock or unlock a user
Requires: Admin role

Change user password
- Admin can change any user's password
- Non-admin can only change their own password
- Requires old password for verification
- All existing sessions will be invalidated after password change
